data.description:
Dive into DARKSWORD: BATTLE ETERNITY, a captivating VR action RPG set within the enigmatic world of the Twisted Corridors. This game offers an unparalleled experience of fast-paced combat in a dark fantasy setting:

Unprecedented VR Combat Experience
• Engage in exhilarating hack-and-slash battles, where you can develop a unique combat style, take advantage of enemy weaknesses, and amass materials for crafting superior weaponry.

Endless Waves of Monsters
• Embark on an epic battle against relentless enemies, aiming for the top floor as you grow stronger along the way. Randomized power-up skills render each run different every time.

Continuous Progression
• Revel in the satisfaction of growth—collect materials, purchase, craft, and upgrade your weapon to enhance your power and combat effectiveness.

Versatile Gameplay
• Whether you prefer to take on challenges solo or thrive in the camaraderie of a 4-player party, DARKSWORD accommodates all playstyles, offering a diverse gaming experience.

DARKSWORD combines the thrill of VR with the depth of action RPGs, ensuring a rich and varied experience for all players.

changelog.change_log:
- Unreal Engine 5.3.2 update
- Increased player level from 60 to 75
- New skill: battle axe
- New legendary weapon set
- New single-player DLC: Nephilim
- 3 New boss monsters (DLC)
- Lobby menu renewal
- Increased Gold and XP reward
- Increased movement speed
- Improved parry success rate
- Increased weapon upgrade success rate
Please check out the newest Update Info.
Please see the most recent Update Info.

Hot Fix Update (v 1.1.8.4)

- bHaptics crash issue fixed
- Missing damage widget issue fixed
- Unresponsive Inventory button issue fixed
- Added smooth turn functionality in the settings menu (available for singleplayer mode)
